bio.summary: Full stack developer with a passion for building responsive web applications and scalable backend systems. Experienced in delivering high-quality code, collaborating across teams, and integrating modern web technologies.
description: Developed and maintained applications across the full stack, from database to user interface.
Collaborated with designers and product managers to deliver features on time and to spec.
Optimized backend APIs for performance, scalability, and security.
Mentored junior developers and contributed to code reviews, ensuring best practices.

experiences.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: Designed and built microservices to support high-traffic SaaS applications.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployments.
Integrated third-party APIs for payments, authentication, and analytics.
Led frontend migration from legacy framework to React and TypeScript.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Built custom dashboards and reporting tools for enterprise clients.
Developed RESTful and GraphQL APIs to serve multiple frontend apps.
Optimized queries and indexes to improve database performance.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
description: Created mobile-first UI components with reusable styling.
Worked closely with QA to improve automated test coverage.
Refactored legacy codebases for better maintainability.

projects.title: Project Atlas
projects.description: A project management web app with real-time collaboration, task tracking, and integrated chat.

projects.title: ShopEase
projects.description: E-commerce platform with product recommendations, secure checkout, and admin dashboards.

projects.title: TravelMate
projects.description: Travel planning app that suggests itineraries, finds local attractions, and syncs across devices.
